turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Assistant, I'd like to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which Starbucks would you like your order to be placed at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please order from the Mohegan Lake starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have a peppermint mocha please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would that be hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a venti mocha please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: This drink comes with whole milk, would you like to change that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you, whole milk is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want whipped cream on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you, assistant.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What about the chocolate curls?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you would like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You have a free drink reward, would you like that to be applied?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Thanks for reminding me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Would you like the order to be placed now or at a different time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please place the order now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Your order will be ready in 5-7 minutes. Is there anything else I could do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that's all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Enjoy your coffee.
